typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PartyId as long,
		PartyName as string,
		PartyTypeId as integer,
		GlobalLocationNumber as decimal(13,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'synapse',
	folderPath: 'ivs-synapse-dldb/Party') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'temp',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
